entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
